articles.summary:
Getting Started with PCB Design and Image Editing

To begin, you’ll need a basic understanding of electronics and some image editing skills. Here’s what you’ll need:

Downloads

  1. KiCad: Used for designing the PCB.
  2. Inkscape: Used for processing the PCB design to make it compatible with CNC software.

Additionally, you can use Photoshop for advanced editing, but I’ll be using Photopea a free, browser-based Photoshop alternative.
articles.title: How to make a pcb
